title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance to erase his criminal history.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Parasite
overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy and the destitute.

title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max helps a rebellious woman and a group of female prisoners flee.

title: La La Land
overview: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Get Out
overview: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
overview: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy.

title: Coco
overview: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Goodfellas
overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: The Lion King
overview: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Spirited Away
overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by witches and populated by strange creatures.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Casablanca
overview: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

title: Back to the Future
overview: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend.

title: The Shining
overview: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings.

title: Jurassic Park
overview: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
